records.name: Komandoo Island Resort & Spa

descriptions.direction: Located in Komandoo, Komandoo Maldives Island Resort is near the beach. While the natural beauty of Hurawalhi Beach and Kuredu Beach can be enjoyed by anyone, those looking for an activity can check out Meedhoo Harbor. Palm Island Beach and Velaa Private Island are two other places to visit that come recommended. Looking to get your feet wet? Kayaking, snorkeling and water skiing adventures can be found near the property.
descriptions.general: General description: In the vicinity of a private sandy beach is located the hotel Komandoo Island Resort & Spa (adults only). At the beach are sun umbrellas free of charge available. The town Male' City is around 147 km away. In the vicinity of the hotel are a number of shopping facilities. In the evening, you can go dancing in a nightclub in the hotelâ€™s surroundings. The airport (MLE) is approx. 132 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: It offers its guests a 24h reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, air conditioning, kiosk and various other shops. For the meals, there are two restaurants and a snack bar. For guests with physical disabilities the hotel has a barrier-free access and a wheelchair accessible lift. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one pool. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Full board: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Breakfast and lunch and dinner only in selected restaurants. All inclusive Plus: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Breakfast as well as lunch and dinner only in selected restaurants. Small snacks (15:00 - 18:00). Water, soft drinks, beer, wine, selected imported spirits, national alcoholic drinks, coffee/tea as well as cocktails at certain times. Free minibar (limited). Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Tennis (where applicable, for a fee), billiards (where applicable, for a fee), badminton (where applicable, for a fee), darts (where applicable, for a fee), table tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. Spa area and massages available (where applicable for a fee). Entertainment for adults: evening shows. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and German. Accepted methods of payment: Euro / MasterCard. Beach Villa: With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Beach Villa (Domestic Flight Included): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Beach Villa (With Jacuzzi): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Beach Villa (With Jacuzzi - Seaplane): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Beach Villa (Seaplane Included): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Beach Villa (With Jacuzzi - Domestic Flight): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Premium Beach Villa (With Jacuzzi): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Premium Beach Villa (With Jacuzzi - Seaplane): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Premium Beach Villa (With Jacuzzi - Domestic Flight): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Ocean Water Villa (With Jacuzzi - Seaplane): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Ocean Water Villa (With Jacuzzi - Domestic Flight): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Water Villa (With Jacuzzi): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Water Villa (With Jacuzzi - Seaplane): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Water Villa (With Jacuzzi - Domestic Flight): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Water Villa (Ocean View, With Jacuzzi): With shared pool, balcony or terrace, heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Seaplane transfers are applicable to all guests arriving at Male Airport between 06:30 to 15:15 hrs. Approx of 40 mins away from Male Airport to Resort. Available during daylight hours from 6:30 hrs to 16:00 hrs. Last international arrival flight for seaplane connection is 15:30h. In case of a planned late international arrivals and further seaplane transfer, an additional accommodation in Male has to be booked by the tour operator. Standard permissible weight is 25 kg, which includes 20 kg of checked-in luggage and 5 kg of hand luggage per person. ERRATA: Customer Information - Comment:Domestic Transfer may have longer waiting time. Baggage allowance is 22 kg checked luggage and 5 kg carry-on luggage. Any excess luggage is chargeable at the airport during airline checkin
